I'm 30 years old, Algerian ubunteros living in Algeria.
I'm a Team Leader of the LoCo Team <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/AlgerianTeam|Ubuntu-DZ]]</nowiki> (Ubuntu Algeria)

== Ubuntu Activity ==
=== Launchpad ===
* <nowiki>[[https://translations.launchpad.net/~ButterflyOfFire|Translation]]</nowiki> : French and Kabyle languages
=== Ubuntu-DZ ===
* Co-founded and lead the <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/AlgerianTeam|Ubuntu-DZ (Ubuntu Algeria) LoCo Team]]</nowiki>
* Admin and moderator for the <nowiki>[[http://ubuntu-dz.tuxfamily.org/forum/|Ubuntu-DZ Forum]]</nowiki>
* Admin and coordinator in <nowiki>[[https://edge.launchpad.net/~ubuntu-dz-webteam|Ubuntu-DZ WebTeam]]</nowiki> and <nowiki>[[https://edge.launchpad.net/ubuntu-dz-website|Ubuntu-DZ Website Projet]]</nowiki>
* Admin for <nowiki>[[https://edge.launchpad.net/~ubuntu-l10n-kab|Ubuntu Kabyle Translators]]</nowiki> (!)
* Operator in #ubuntu-dz on  irc.freenode.net
* Active in the organisation of <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/AlgerianTeam|Ubuntu-DZ Wiki]]</nowiki>
* Designed the logo :

{{https://wiki.ubuntu.com/AlgerianTeam/logo_ubuntu-dz?action=AttachFile&do=get&target=ubuntu-dz-site.png}}

== My Blog ==
* <nowiki>[[http://www.freefoxtv.net/2008/10/28/ubuntu-dz-la-team-officielle-ubuntu-algerie/|1st Article]]</nowiki> about Ubuntu-DZ
* About the <nowiki>[[http://www.freefoxtv.net/2008/11/27/ubuntu-algerie-premier-meeting-officiel-sur-irc/|first meeting of Ubuntu-DZ]]</nowiki> LoCo Team Members
* FreeFoxTV is the name of both my blog and my <nowiki>[[http://www.free.fr/adsl/pages/television/tv-perso.html|personal TV]]</nowiki>. I broadcast via the Network of <nowiki>[[http://www.free.fr/adsl/index.html|Free (French Internet Provider)]]</nowiki>. A made a lot of people discover Ubuntu on TV through various live tutorials about Ubuntu since 1 year and a half of broadcasting.

== plans and ideas for Ubuntu in the future ==
* Reinforce the translation of Ubuntu in Kabyle language
* Setting up an Ubuntu Mirror in Algeria (It will be the second GNU/Linux Mirror in Algeria after debian.usthb.dz)
* Spread all the advantages of using Ubuntu as the first OS in a computer for individual or professional use
